InstructionData.Title: rocketElectricUmbilical
InstructionData.Author: Rizzard of Oz
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias activationLever d0 alias electricUmbilical d1 alias LED d2
alias leverState r0
start: s LED Color 3
awaitingActivation: l leverState activationLever Open beq leverState 1 openUmbilical yield j awaitingActivation
openUmbilical: s LED Color 0 s electricUmbilical Open 1 awaitDeactivation: l leverState activationLever Open beq leverState 1 awaitDeactivation s LED Color 3 s electricUmbilical Open 0 j awaitingActivation
